Ditto to press organisations who get my name wrong when writing about my shows. All you have to do is copy and paste from our press release. It really shouldn’t be that hard. #branding
This is very petty, but if you’re an actor I’ve worked with and on your spotlight you call me Lucy Atkinson instead of Lucy Jane Atkinson, I will be momentarily VERY mad at you. #branding

The really bullshit thing is that he HAD left the table. He literally came over to me on his way out of the pub JUST to yell at me. He wasn’t getting another drink, he wasn’t going to sit back at the table, he just wanted to shout at a girl sitting alone.

At the pub, I sit at the table with two empty glasses & a crumpled paper on it which has been empty for 20 mins. Man comes over, yells that he had been sitting there & tells me to “have some fucking respect.” So now I’m physically shaking and trying not to cry in my local.
